minions.name: Starlyte
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion has +1 power for each of your other minions here

minions.name: Rainbow
minions.description: Talent: If you have played another minion here, draw a card

minions.name: Seastar
minions.description: If you play this minion on a base where you have another minion, you can play an extra minion this turn. Only use one Seastar's ability each turn

minions.name: Pinkie
minions.description: Ongoing: While another of your minions is here, this minion has +1 power

actions.name: Encouragement Power
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power for each of your other minions here

actions.name: Togetherness Power
actions.description: Play an extra minion at a base where you have a minion

actions.name: Adventure Power
actions.description: Choose a base. Move any number of your minions to it

actions.name: Freedom Power
actions.description: Destroy an action played on a minion or a base

actions.name: Friendship Power
actions.description: Move one of your minions to a base where you have a minion. You may place this action into your hand instead of the discard pile

actions.name: Sharing Power
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more minions here, draw a card

actions.name: Super Future Space Armor Power
actions.description: Each of your minions that is on a base with another of your minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Teaching Power
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, reveal one card from your deck for each of your minions there. Play one minion you reveal as an extra minion there. Return the rest of the cards to the top of the deck in any order
